articles.title: Why are FIIs fleeing Indian stocks? Blame it on bonds - Forbes India
articles.description: As bond yields in the US start to rise, investors switch out of foreign markets, especially emerging markets, to hunt for better opportunities at home, which pressurises equities. Are Indian stock markets prepared to face the FII exodus?
articles.content:
